choices: Next day, after classes are over
Just then, Mina's new roommate comes in
1.content:
Mina stood in front of the black gates at the entrance of the university. This was not just any college either, for one thing, it wasn't even located on Earth, but in Limbo, on the outer reaches of the underworld. A week ago, Mina was your average college girl in the Midwestern US. The last thing she remembers is going to a sorority\fraternity mixer party, having a few drinks and passing out. Next thing she knows, she wakes up literally in Hell.

Long story short, she is accepted as a new student at Succubus University, where she will learn to punish the worst of human kind. Rapists, child molesters, etc. The gates swing open and she steps into the campus, making her way towards the main hall. She comes to a large pair of double doors and knocks on them almost hesitantly. "Come in." Says a female voice from the other side.

Mina opens the door and therebehind a large polished desk sat the Headmistress, Ms. Blythe. She was a blue skinned demoness with black hair and large, ram-like horns on the sides of her head, as well as a quite voluptuous figure. But being a succubus, that was to be expected. "An, you must be our newest student. Come in, dear." Mind too a seat as Ms?. Blythe pulled up her file on her computer.

"Let's see...it says here you've only been in hell a week. How are you liking it so far?" Mina didn't really know how to answer. "Well...to be honest, it's not quite what I expected. I'm not even sure why I'm here to begin with." Ms. Blythe chuckled "Let's just say you're a special case, which is why you haven't been tormented. Now then, while you're here, you shall learn to use your new abilities to their fullest. I see you don't even have horns or a tail yet, but that will change with time." Me. Blythe reaches into her desk and pulls out a key, handing it to Mina.

"That is the key to your dorm room. Tomorrow you begin your first lessons, so I suggest you rest up."

Mina exited the office and went to the student dormitory where she pay on her bed and contemplated her new life.
1.title: Welcome to Succubus University

info.brief_description: Follow Mina, succubus in training, as she learns to punish the worst of humanity
info.description: You read the description, so you already know what the story is about. As far as rules go, nothing really gross is allowed, and I may add more rules as needed. Other than that, go nuts and enjoy!
